name: Engineer Allison Valentine
descriptions: Allison Valentine is an engineer stationed at the Hoover Dam in 2281.

Valentine was going to watch President Aaron Kimball's speech with her friend, a fellow engineer named Ben, but has not been able to find him. She asks the Courier if they have seen him, saying he was supposed to have met up with her on the second floor of the Hoover Dam visitor center an hour ago.

topics.response_text: Hey, you haven't seen my friend around here, have you? His name is Ben and he's an engineer.
Okay, well... I guess I'll just keep waiting. Sorry to bother you.

topics.topic_text: Maybe he's down in the barracks.
topics.response_text: He isn't. I already checked there this morning. We were supposed to meet up here about an hour ago.

topics.topic_text: He probably ditched you for someone cuter.
topics.response_text: Why would you say something like that? That's just mean.
